title: Do ban records on my account reset after a time period
body: So around 10 months ago I got a 2 week suspension for doing something I rather not mention and I heard the next ban would be a perma. So I was wondering if the record or strike on your account is their forever or if it expires after a certain amount of time because im kinda nervous I will mess up once and get permabanned

replies.body:
do we drop back another tier when we reform like i justgot 14 day ban and ifi reform and play nice and good will the ban level go back one?
so my next punishment wont be perma it will be chat restriction

The history of that happening will stay with you, but after awhile it's weight gets reduced since playing honorable over a long period of time can show that you're doing your best to be a team player. Always keep in mind that certain things aren't okay in any context and could make you skip levels of punishment. Long time good behavior doesn't get you a free pass xP!
